plant.name: FlexPulse
plant.cabbagecode: $CONTAINER bounds(0, 0, 155, 50) { $HG_BUTTON pos(0, 5), size(50, 14), channel("pulse-on"), text("Uni"), popuptext("Unison Pulses") $HG_BUTTON pos(0, 26), size(50, 14), channel("alt-on"), text("Alt"), popuptext("Alternating Pulses") $ENV_KNOB pos(55,0), size(50,50), range(0,100,15,1,.01), channel("pulse-width"), text("Duty %"), popupprefix("Duty: "), popuppostfix(" %") $ENV_KNOB pos(105,0), size(50,50), range(.125,10,.5,1,.01), channel("pulse-cps"), text("Rate"), popupprefix("Rate: "), popuppostfix(" Hz") }
plant.csoundcode:
#include "includes/udo/shape.inc.csd"
; Gets it's own value so it doesn't mess with settings ; This is a problem! #ifndef PULSE_DECLICK_ENV #define PULSE_DECLICK_ENV #.001# #endif
; generates two krate pulse envs based off chan names for inputs ; pulse (on, off), pulse width %, table number ; pulses will be offset from each other by a half table ; rate is of each env, not the time between them! ; width is halved, guaranteeing alternation in envs opcode FlexPulse,aa,S SChanPrefix xin
kPulse chnget strcat(SChanPrefix,"pulse-on") kAltPulse chnget strcat(SChanPrefix,"alt-on") kWidth chnget strcat(SChanPrefix,"pulse-width") kCPS chnget strcat(SChanPrefix,"pulse-cps")
if(changed(kPulse)==1 && kPulse==1) then chnset k(0), strcat(SChanPrefix,"alt-on") elseif(changed(kAltPulse)==1 && kAltPulse==1) then chnset k(0), strcat(SChanPrefix,"pulse-on") endif
; this draws a pulse, and halves the width if alternating outputs iTable DrawPulse kAltPulse==1 ? kWidth*.5 : kWidth
if(kPulse==1) then kEnvL poscil 1, kCPS, iTable kEnvR = kEnvL elseif(kAltPulse==1) then kEnvL poscil 1, kCPS*.5, iTable kEnvR poscil 1, kCPS*.5, iTable,.5 else kEnvL=1 kEnvR=1 endif
; DeClick kEnvL port kEnvL, $PULSE_DECLICK_ENV aEnvL interp kEnvL kEnvR port kEnvR, $PULSE_DECLICK_ENV aEnvR interp kEnvR
xout aEnvL, aEnvR endop
opcode FlexPulse,kk,S SChanPrefix xin
kPulse chnget strcat(SChanPrefix,"pulse-on") kAltPulse chnget strcat(SChanPrefix,"alt-on") kWidth chnget strcat(SChanPrefix,"pulse-width") kCPS chnget strcat(SChanPrefix,"pulse-cps")
if(changed(kPulse)==1 && kPulse==1) then chnset k(0), strcat(SChanPrefix,"alt-on") elseif(changed(kAltPulse)==1 && kAltPulse==1) then chnset k(0), strcat(SChanPrefix,"pulse-on") endif
; this draws a pulse, and halves the width if alternating outputs iTable DrawPulse kAltPulse==1 ? kWidth*.5 : kWidth
if(kPulse==1) then kEnvL poscil 1, kCPS, iTable kEnvR = kEnvL elseif(kAltPulse==1) then kEnvL poscil 1, kCPS*.5, iTable kEnvR poscil 1, kCPS*.5, iTable,.5 else kEnvL=1 kEnvR=1 endif
; DeClick kEnvL port kEnvL, $PULSE_DECLICK_ENV kEnvR port kEnvR, $PULSE_DECLICK_ENV
xout kEnvL, kEnvR endop
